summary.summary_text: Highly motivated Computer Science graduate with a strong foundation in Python and C++, eager to contribute as a Software Engineer at a leading global trading firm. Proven ability to build real-world applications and solve complex technical problems, with experience in developing high-performance data pipelines and backend services. Seeking to leverage analytical skills and a collaborative mindset to drive innovation in financial markets.

experience.experience_1_title_company_location: Software Developer Intern, Dev Global Services, Vijayawada, India
experience_1_bullets: Built production data pipeline using Python and FastAPI, processing 10K+ daily API requests with sub-100ms latency, supporting real-time enrollment analytics for 500+ concurrent users with microservices architecture and RESTful APIs.

Resolved complex database performance issues by optimizing PostgreSQL via indexing and SQL tuning, reducing data retrieval latency by 40% and enabling instant search across 10K+ student records, contributing to continuous improvement.

Implemented well-architected microservices backend achieving 99.9% uptime and zero-downtime deployments, ensuring data quality and system reliability for critical enrollment workflows while collaborating with a cross-functional team of 4 engineers in an Agile environment.
Developed backend services that enabled real-time data processing for critical decision-making, while maintaining 85%+ test coverage through CI/CD pipelines.
experience.experience_2_title_company_location: UX Design & Web Development Volunteer, University of Florida
experience_2_bullets: Partnered with a cross-team of engineers and faculty to architect a data warehouse for the Yantra educational platform, conducting user research with 50+ students to drive data-informed design decisions and define technical requirements.
Designed analytics dashboards using React.js, JavaScript, HTML5, and PostgreSQL to extract insights from engagement data, enabling instructors to optimize content delivery for 1K+ users.
Drove process improvement initiatives through SQL-based user behavior analysis, identifying friction points that improved navigation efficiency by 35%.

project_1_bullets: Architected an end-to-end data warehouse and ETL pipeline using Python processing 100K+ e-commerce transactions across 3 years of marketplace data, demonstrating technical leadership in project execution.
Deployed analytics system on AWS EC2 with cloud computing infrastructure and automated data quality monitoring, reducing analyst query time by 20% through SQL optimization and performance tuning.

Developed a machine learning model achieving R² = 0.96 for predictive analytics using 5+ engineered features, collaborating with stakeholders to generate insights for seller performance and logistics optimization.
project_2_bullets: Built a scalable backend data pipeline using Node.js, JavaScript, and MongoDB supporting 100+ concurrent users, reducing query response times by 35% through strategic indexing and performance optimization.

Integrated a Python-based ML model via RESTful API achieving 93% classification accuracy, demonstrating strong cross-functional collaboration with the frontend team to define data interfaces and technical specifications.
Architected a MongoDB schema to support real-time auction workflows and secure authentication processes, tackling complex problem-solving for scalable systems.

education.masters_coursework: Data Structures and Algorithms, Object-Oriented Programming, Database Systems, Operating Systems, Software Engineering Principles, Introduction to Financial Markets

achievements_bullets: Demonstrated technical leadership and problem-solving skills by presenting a machine learning solution at the HERE Technologies Hackathon on Land and House Price Prediction, showcasing predictive analytics expertise.
Awarded USD 4,500 scholarship during Master's at University of Florida for strong academic record and a 25% merit scholarship during undergraduate studies.
